CustomField.description: BE ABSOLUTELY SURE THIS IS A MOBILE NUMBER. We may use this field in the future for text message campaigns. If you don't have a mobile number or are not sure, leave this field blank and enter the number in the "Phone" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: BE ABSOLUTELY SURE THIS IS A MOBILE NUMBER. We may use this field in the future for text message campaigns. If you don't have a mobile number or are not sure, leave this field blank and enter the number in the "Phone" field.
